channel.title: Removing client per thread errors
channel.description:
got a few errors in client.java. Im using an allstar scape source.
client.java:25247: illegal start of expression private int numBytesInBuffer, offset; ^ client.java:25248: illegal start of expression public void parseOutgoingPackets() { ^ client.java:25248: illegal start of expression public void parseOutgoingPackets() { ^ client.java:25248: ';' expected public void parseOutgoingPackets() { ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .
Thanks if you can help. :D

item.title: Removing client per thread errors
item.dc:creator: @Rossehscape Rossehscape
item.description:

got a few errors in client.java.
Im using an allstar scape source.
